        java.math.MathContext getMathContext()
        MathContext used to make a BigDecimal. Should never return null. if no has precision limit return MathContext.UNLIMITED.
        Returns:
        the MathContext

        int precision()
        Total number of digits, decimals and integers, that you may have. hasPrecision() return false if it has no limit.
